column2: "Oh, it's you. Look at this architecture!"
"This isn't just a stone monument! Using weak magnetic forces it oscillates at certain frequencies."
"Except the oscillations are set, they change depending on the time, even though the structure remains the same!"
"The more I look at it, the more i draws my curiosity, This is easily the sum of the mystery of the Dragonkin in physical form."
"Hm, hey wait."
"〔Don't touch it〕〔So recklessly〕"
"Ah, long time no see, Ryu of Ko."

"〔I heard〕〔We gave you〕
〔Permission to enter〕〔The Dragon Alter〕"

"〔But you are〕〔Not allowed to〕
〔Investigate〕〔Everything you wish〕"
"I understand that. But putting something this interesting in and telling me not to research it is impossible."
"You of all people should understand that quality about me, right?"

"〔It is lamentable, but〕〔That is exactly〕
〔Why I came here〕"
"In other words, your going to act as my guide from now on?"

"〔I am disappointed at this, but yes
〔Rela was〕〔Too inexperienced〕"

"〔This is〕〔The place where our〕
〔Souls〕〔Rest in piece〕"
"Piece of mind for souls? You mean a burial ground?"
"〔Our souls〕〔require a shell〕〔in which to dwell in〕〔What we respect is the soul, not the shell〕"

"〔Our〕〔souls〕
〔Gather〕〔Refine〕
〔And reach a higher place〕"
"〔Dragonkin die〕〔But our souls do not〕"

"〔Lives return〕〔to this place〕
〔And from this place more flesh and blood comes to dwell〕"
"The consciousness of multiple souls gather, reacher a higher state and are reborn. In order words, reincarnation?"
"Except there are no recorded example of this is scientific literature..."
"Ah, sorry. Anyways, I think I got the picture, thanks Ryu."
"Sorry to be trouble, but I have a lot of questions for you involving the structures around here. Is this okay?"

"〔If I don't answer〕
〔I know you'll just investigate on your own〕"
"〔I simply came here〕〔to stop you from doing that〕"
"Then you'd better speak up and make this easier on the both of us. <%me>, see you next time."
